data.title: Lord of the Rings: Tales of the Shire: Here’s what we know so far about release window, gameplay, platforms, trailers and more
meta_keywords: Lord of the Rings Tales of the Shire
data.meta_description: Tales of the Shire is set to transport players to the peaceful village of Bywater, offering a slice of Hobbit life with cozy, lifestyle simulation gameplay. Developed by Weta Workshop and published by Private Division, this game promises a unique perspective on The Lord of the Rings universe, focusing on the simple joys of daily life in Middle-earth.
data.text:
Synopsis

Tales of the Shire is set to transport players to the peaceful village of Bywater, offering a slice of Hobbit life with cozy, lifestyle simulation gameplay. Developed by Weta Workshop and published by Private Division, this game promises a unique perspective on The Lord of the Rings universe, focusing on the simple joys of daily life in Middle-earth.

The Lord of the Rings franchise is expanding its universe with a new game, Tales of the Shire, set to immerse players in the charming world of Hobbits. Here's a comprehensive look at what we know about this upcoming title.

Trailers

The first official announcement trailer for Tales of the Shire was released on April 22, 2024. It introduces the village of Bywater, a tranquil part of the Shire, and emphasizes the theme of "new beginnings" rather than epic quests. A teaser dropped on September 22, 2023, Bilbo and Frodo's birthday, gave fans an initial glimpse into the game's atmosphere and setting.

Release Window, Platforms

Tales of the Shire is scheduled for release in 2024 on PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch, Xbox Series consoles and PC. Specific dates are yet to be announced.

Gameplay

Described as a "cozy The Lord of the Rings game," Tales of the Shire falls into the cozy games category, blending lifestyle simulation with resource management and building elements. Players can engage in activities, such as foraging, gardening, fishing and cooking, as well as decorate their Hobbit hole.

Developers and Publishers

Weta Workshop, renowned for its work on The Lord of the Rings film trilogy, is developing Tales of the Shire. This venture marks their first foray into video game development, leveraging their expertise in creating intricate props and sets. Private Division, a subsidiary of Take-Two Interactive, is the publisher, known for titles like Hades and Outer Worlds.

FAQs:

What platforms will Lord of the Rings Tales of the Shire be available on?

Tales of the Shire will be available on PlayStation 5, Nintendo Switch, Xbox Series consoles, and PC in 2024.

What type of game is Lord of the Rings Tales of the Shire?

Tales of the Shire is a cozy game set in The Lord of the Rings universe, featuring lifestyle simulation, resource management and building elements.
